thread.title: ‘Big Little Lies’: Shailene Woodley on American Repression, Violence, and Why ‘Every Parent is Afraid of Their Kid’
thread.title_full: ‘Big Little Lies’: Shailene Woodley on American Repression, Violence, and Why ‘Every Parent is Afraid of Their Kid’

author: Ben Travers
title: ‘Big Little Lies’: Shailene Woodley on American Repression, Violence, and Why ‘Every Parent is Afraid of Their Kid’
text: The "Big Little Lies" discusses how secrets lead to violence, violence invades our culture, and the kids are the ones who suffer.
